org.datavec.api.split.partition

Interface Partitioner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NumberOfRecordsPartitioner

    public interface Partitioner
    A partitioner for iterating thorugh files for RecordWriter. This allows for a configurable log rotation like algorithm for partitioning files by number of recodrds, sizes among other things.

      • needsNewPartition

        boolean needsNewPartition()
        Returns true if the partition needs to be moved to the next. This is controlled with updatePartitionInfo(PartitionMetaData) which handles incrementing counters and the like to determine whether the current partition has been exhausted.
        Returns:
